summary: Website needs visitor activity tracking so the owner can see what users/customers did on the site (actions taken, options chosen, and what they typed/submitted).

existing_features.title: Send high-signal journey events from the frontend to the backend: node/page views, answer submissions (selected options), and submitted text (including ThinkFlow step answers and QuestionCard text inputs).
Update the existing Admin Dashboard to display backend-tracked activity per visitor (timeline view) and allow exporting the tracked events as JSON.
Introduce a consistent anonymous visitor identifier on the frontend so customer actions can be tied together across pages and sessions without requiring login.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add visitor/user activity tracking to record what users did on the website (pages viewed, options chosen/clicked, and form inputs/submissions) so the owner can review customer behavior.
Persist customer activity tracking to the Motoko backend so the site owner can review what each visitor did (pages/nodes visited, options chosen, and text the visitor submitted).

projectName: Add customer activity tracking for choices, typed inputs, and journey actions (admin viewable)
